result.html: A rún mo chroíOh love of my heart!
result.ponchtml: A rún mo ċroíOh love of my heart!

result.html: Bhuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail taom croí éHe got a heart attack.

result.html: Ghoil sí uisce a cinnShe cried her heart out.
result.ponchtml: Ġoil sí uisce a cinnShe cried her heart out.

result.eng: Not tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ga: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.orig: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.html: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ponchtml: Ċan dólás croí aċ sólás croí a ḃí ar Ṡéimí nuair a ḃí a ḟaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.

result.eng: I hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ga: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.orig: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroí
result.html: Bhí fuath na námhad agam air i mo chroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fuaṫ na náṁad agam air i mo ċroíI hated him passionately with all my heart.
